To.title: To
To.description: The email addresses of one or more recipients. For multiple email addresses, use a comma as a separator.

Subject.title: Subject
Subject.description: A description that serves to summarize the email content

Body.title: Body
Body.description: The body content of the email message

CC.title: Cc
CC.description: The email addresses of the Carbon copy (Cc) recipients whom you intend to keep in the email loop. For multiple email addresses, use a comma as a separator.

BCC.title: Bcc
BCC.description: The email addresses of the Blind carbon copy (Bcc) recipients whom you intend to keep private. For multiple email addresses, use a comma as a separator.
